Description:
Five years ago Carl Johnson escaped from the Los Santos , metropolis steeped in street wars , drug trafficking and corruption , home of movie stars and millionaires , trying to ignore the drug dealers and gangsters .
The duration of the game - early 90s. Carl is forced to return to his hometown. His mother was killed , brother and sister had a falling out , and childhood friends - on shit .
On the way home from the airport Charles stop corrupt cops , and then " hang " on a recent murder of a policeman . To protect yourself and loved ones will have to travel to Carl almost all of San Andreas .
Rockstar Games is his biggest game on mobile devices : there you can look in every corner of the vast open world - the entire state of San Andreas, represented by its three major cities : Los Santos , San Fierro and Las Venturas . Graphic component game improved , and its estimated duration is 70 hours.
